snippet.title: The Bugs Manor - Teaser
snippet.description:
The Bugs Manor is a free top-down 2D pixel art horror game. Explore a cursed mansion, hide from scary monsters, avoid a bloody gore death with stealth, and solve puzzles with an inventory-free gameplay focused on direct interactions with the environment.

Uncover the mysteries of this haunted house in this dark indie videogame by wishlisting it on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2078280/The_Bugs_Manor
